hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.body: I'm on a course at the moment puremeds.net It will be hard to ever top the approach shot hit by Shaun Micheel at Oak Hill's 18th hole in 2003, but Jonas Blixt likely just hit the shot of the 2013 edition of the PGA Championship on that hole. Blixt, a little-known Swede but 2013 PGA Tour winner at Greenbrier, was well off the fairway and needed to hit a laser just to get up around the green. A laser which needed to be a significant draw, out of that major championship rough, to a green that is significantly raised above the fairway seemed like an impossibility. But Blixt not only carried it over the steep hill abutting the front of the green, he stuck it to within a couple feet:
